name: part_001
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】ねねが主役！！！！！ #桃鈴ねね誕生日2022【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ ホロライブ 】 [czfjbNitJ4M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Yozora Mel and Momosuzu Nene perform 'Hoshikuzu Witch Meruru'.
Hoshimachi Suisei, Tokoyami Towa, and Momosuzu Nene perform 'Namae no Nai Kaibutsu'.

subtitles.original: キラリッ☆
subtitles.english: Sparkle☆

subtitles.original: あなたのハートをねらい撃つの
subtitles.english: I'll aim and shoot your heart

subtitles.original: あなたのハートをねらい撃つの
subtitles.english: I'll aim and shoot your heart

subtitles.original: だ・か・ら よわたしの全力♪全開魔法♪
subtitles.english: That's why! My full power! Full-throttle magic♪

subtitles.original: 逃げずに ちゃんと受け止めてよね〜
subtitles.english: Don't run away, make sure to catch it properly~

subtitles.original: めーるめるめる
subtitles.english: Meru-meru-meru

subtitles.original: めるめるめるめるめ〜
subtitles.english: meru-meru-meru-meru-me~

subtitles.original: 虚空を舞い飛ぶ 女の子☆
subtitles.english: A girl dancing and flying through the void☆

subtitles.original: まじーかーる るっどで ほしを撃つ
subtitles.english: Shooting stars with a magical rod

subtitles.original: 日本のすみから 宇宙のために
subtitles.english: From a corner of Japan, for the sake of the universe

subtitles.original: 跳ねて 暴れて
subtitles.english: Bounce, run wild,

subtitles.original: ごーんにちわー
subtitles.english: and helloooooo

subtitles.original: 星屑うぃっちメルル〜♪
subtitles.english: Stardust Witch Meruru~♪

subtitles.original: しゅ〜てぃんぐすた〜♪
subtitles.english: Shooting star~♪

subtitles.original: しゅ〜てぃんぐすた〜♪
subtitles.english: Shooting star~♪

subtitles.original: あなたの胸に飛び込んで行くの
subtitles.english: I'm diving into your chest

subtitles.original: 太陽よりも 熱いカラダで
subtitles.english: With a body hotter than the sun

subtitles.original: あなたのすべて焼き尽くすの
subtitles.english: I'll burn everything of yours to ashes

subtitles.original: だ・か・ら よわたしの全力♪全開魔法♪
subtitles.english: That's why! My full power! Full-throttle magic♪

subtitles.original: 逃げずに ちゃんと受け止めてよね〜
subtitles.english: Don't run away, make sure to catch it properly~

subtitles.original: 銀河の果てから流星に乗って 落ちて流れてアイタタタ！
subtitles.english: Riding a shooting star from the edge of the galaxy, falling and drifting, ouch ouch ouch!

subtitles.original: みんな お待たせ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thanks for waiting!

subtitles.original: ねねちと夜空メルでお送りしまーす！
subtitles.english: Nenechi and Yozora Mel are bringing this to you!

subtitles.original: 星屑うぃっちメルル 行っきまーす！
subtitles.english: Stardust Witch Meruru, here we go!

subtitles.original: しゅ〜てぃんぐすた〜♪
subtitles.english: Shooting star~♪

subtitles.original: しゅ〜てぃんぐすた〜♪
subtitles.english: Shooting star~♪

subtitles.original: あなたの胸に飛び込んで行くの
subtitles.english: I'm diving into your chest

subtitles.original: 流星よりも 強い気持ちで
subtitles.english: With feelings stronger than a meteor

subtitles.original: あなたのココロ抱きしめるの
subtitles.english: I'll hold your heart tight

subtitles.original: だ・か・ら よわたしの全力♪全開魔法♪
subtitles.english: That's why! My full power! Full-throttle magic♪

subtitles.original: 逃げずに ちゃんと受け止めてよね〜
subtitles.english: Don't run away, make sure to catch it properly~

subtitles.original: めーるめるめる めるめるめるめ〜
subtitles.english: Meru-meru-meru, meru-meru-meru-me~

subtitles.original: 名前のない怪物
subtitles.english: Monster Without a Name

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：ryo(supercell)
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: ryo(supercell)

subtitles.original: 御伽話は さっき死んだみたい
subtitles.english: It seems the fairy tale died just a moment ago

subtitles.original: 御伽話は さっき死んだみたい
subtitles.english: It seems the fairy tale died just a moment ago

subtitles.original: 煉瓦の病棟で うまく歌えなくて
subtitles.english: In the brick ward, I couldn't sing well

subtitles.original: 煉瓦の病棟で うまく歌えなくて
subtitles.english: In the brick ward, I couldn't sing well

subtitles.original: 霧に 煙る夜
subtitles.english: In the night hazy with fog

subtitles.original: 浮かべ 赤い月
subtitles.english: A red moon floats

subtitles.original: ほらみて 私を
subtitles.english: Look at me

subtitles.original: 目を逸らさないで
subtitles.english: Don't look away

subtitles.original: 黒い鉄格子のなかで 私は生まれてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I was born within black iron bars

subtitles.original: 悪意の代償を望むがままに おまえに おまえに
subtitles.english: Providing the price of malice as desired to you, to you

subtitles.original: さあ与えよう
subtitles.english: Now let's bestow

subtitles.original: 正義を 壊して
subtitles.english: justice, destroying it

subtitles.original: 壊される前に 因果の代償を払い
subtitles.english: Before being destroyed, pay the price of karma

subtitles.original: 共に行こう 名前のない怪物
subtitles.english: Let's go together, monster without a name

subtitles.original: 耳鳴りがしてる 鉄条網うるさくて
subtitles.english: My ears are ringing, the barbed wire is noisy

subtitles.original: 耳鳴りがしてる 鉄条網うるさくて
subtitles.english: My ears are ringing, the barbed wire is noisy

subtitles.original: 思い出せないの あの日の旋律
subtitles.english: I can't remember the melody of that day

subtitles.original: 思い出せないの あの日の旋律
subtitles.english: I can't remember the melody of that day
